ChangeList.Description: Added the **outOfOfficeDays** property to the [attackSimulationUser](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attackSimulationUser?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **latestSimulationActivity** property to the [userSimulationDetails](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userSimulationDetails?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [attackSimulationOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attacksimulationoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and a supported method.
Added the [payload](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/payload?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and supported methods.
Added the **operations** relationship to the [attackSimulationRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attacksimulationroot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **payloads** relationship to the [attackSimulationRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attacksimulationroot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **payload** relationship to the [simulation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **durationInDays** property to the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **excludedAccountTarget** property to the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **includedAccountTarget** property to the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [attackSimulationRepeatOffender](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attackSimulationRepeatOffender?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and a supported method.
Added the [attackSimulationSimulationUserCoverage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attackSimulationSimulationUserCoverage?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and a supported method.
Added the [attackSimulationTrainingUserCoverage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attackSimulationTrainingUserCoverage?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and a supported method.
Added the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and supported methods.
Added the [simulationAutomation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulationAutomation?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and supported methods.
Added the [simulationAutomationRun](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulationAutomationRun?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and a supported method.
Added the **security** relationship to the [reportRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Deprecated the [getAttackSimulationRepeatOffenders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getattacksimulationrepeatoffenders?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [reportRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Deprecated the [getAttackSimulationSimulationUserCoverage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getattacksimulationsimulationusercoverage?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [reportRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Deprecated the [getAttackSimulationTrainingUserCoverage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getattacksimulationtrainingusercoverage?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [reportRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [attackSimulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attackSimulationRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property to the [security](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/security?view=graph-rest-beta) resource

Added the [getAttackSimulationRepeatOffenders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/getAttackSimulationRepeatOffenders?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [reportRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [getAttackSimulationSimulationUserCoverage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/getAttackSimulationSimulationUserCoverage?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [reportRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [getAttackSimulationTrainingUserCoverage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/getAttackSimulationTrainingUserCoverage?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [reportRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **simulationMode** enumeration type. This enumeration is not used.
Removed the **notCompleted** member from the **trainingStatus** enumeration. This member is not used.
Removed the **mode** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This property is not used.
Added the **running** member to the **simulationStatus** enumeration.
Removed the **inProgress** member from the **simulationStatus** enumeration.
Added the **succeeded** member to the **simulationStatus** enumeration.
Removed the **completed** member from the **simulationStatus** enumeration.
Removed the **partiallyCompleted** member from the **simulationStatus** enumeration.
Removed the **deleted** member from the **simulationStatus** enumeration.
Removed the **included** member from the **simulationStatus** enumeration.
Added the **simulationAutomations** relationship to the [attackSimulationRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attacksimulationroot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **automationId** property to the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **cleanupArtifacts** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **enableRegionTimezoneDelivery** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **includeAllAccountTargets** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **payloadSource** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **trainingAssignmentPreference** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **trainingContentPreference** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **trainingDueDateTime** property from the [simulation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [simulationAutomation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulationautomation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type and a supported list method.
Added the [simulationAutomationRun](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/simulationautomationrun?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type and a supported list method.
Removed the **notCompleted** member from the **trainingStatus** enumeration. This member is not used.
